From: James Adams <James.Adams@chalhoub.com> 
Sent: Friday, 14 March 2025 3:52 PM
To: Binay Kumar <Binay.Santuka@chalhoub.com>; Mohammed El Neel <Mohammed.Elneel@chalhoub.com>; Evelyn Belmonte <Evelyn.Belmonte@chalhoub.com>; Vince Mulé <Vincenzo.Mule@chalhoub.com>; Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>; Shimmy George <Shimmy.George@chalhoub.com>; Dee Deu <dee.deu@chalhoub.com>
Cc: Bernardita Ramos <Bernardita.Ramos@chalhoub.com>; Tarek Naoum <Tarek.Naoum@chalhoub.com>; Emily Dimaranan <Emily.Dimaranan@chalhoub.com>; MDM Finance <MDMFinance@chalhoub.com>; Nada Boutros <Nada.Boutros@chalhoub.com>; Waqas Ahmad <Waqas.Ahmad@chalhoub.com>
Subject: RE: URGENT RE: (URGENT) Request for Credit Note 

 

Dear all,

 

We have informed both banks of this incident and asked them to block the fraudulent account and initiate the fund recovery process.  The likelihood of recovering anything is usually low, although it can sometimes be successful.

 

Our Group also has some insurance for bank related phishing frauds, although the amounts involved in this case are probably lower than the excess.  I have copied @Hagop Ghazarian <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>  who can check the details.

chunks.text:
Our Group also has some insurance for bank related phishing frauds, although the amounts involved in this case are probably lower than the excess.  I have copied @Hagop Ghazarian <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>  who can check the details.

 

@Dee Deu <mailto:dee.deu@chalhoub.com>  appreciate if you can complete a full root cause analysis with the MDM team and then let us know what learnings can be taken for next time.  

 

Well done to everyone for highlighting this and taking fast action.

 

Kind regards,

James

 

JAMES ADAMS​​​​

VP ‑ TREASURY

M.C.T. FZE

chunks.text:
From: Binay Kumar <Binay.Santuka@chalhoub.com <mailto:Binay.Santuka@chalhoub.com> > 
Sent: Friday, 14 March 2025 2:47 PM
To: Waqas Ahmad <Waqas.Ahmad@chalhoub.com <mailto:Waqas.Ahmad@chalhoub.com> >; Nada Boutros <Nada.Boutros@chalhoub.com <mailto:Nada.Boutros@chalhoub.com> >
Cc: Mohammed El Neel <Mohammed.Elneel@chalhoub.com <mailto:Mohammed.Elneel@chalhoub.com> >; Bernardita Ramos <Bernardita.Ramos@chalhoub.com <mailto:Bernardita.Ramos@chalhoub.com> >; James Adams <James.Adams@chalhoub.com <mailto:James.Adams@chalhoub.com> >; Tarek Naoum <Tarek.Naoum@chalhoub.com <mailto:Tarek.Naoum@chalhoub.com> >; Emily Dimaranan <Emily.Dimaranan@chalhoub.com <mailto:Emily.Dimaranan@chalhoub.com> >; Vince Mulé <Vincenzo.Mule@chalhoub.com <mailto:Vincenzo.Mule@chalhoub.com> >; Dee Deu <dee.deu@chalhoub.com <mailto:dee.deu@chalhoub.com> >; MDM Finance <MDMFinance@chalhoub.com <mailto:MDMFinance@chalhoub.com> >
Subject: RE: URGENT RE: (URGENT) Request for Credit Note 

 

Dear Waqas / All,

 

We did check the trail for the supplier bank update from our side, and noticed that we did the mandatory call back process for this update and followed the due diligence as required and nothing unusual was noticed. 

 

We received the supplier contact details on the request and we did a call back accordingly and also insisted for the bank details on a bank letterhead, which was supplied to us. We followed the due process for the supplier call back and I found that we did this twice as the update was requested for 2 entities. Hope this explains the process from MDM side. 

 

Regards,

	﻿ 

	Hi Mohammed, 

	
	Can you please assist in reporting this to the police / Central bank and working with the team here to freeze any transfers and recover any funds?   Please also help Bernie in dealing with the legitimate vendor.

Jerry

	 

	 

JERRY LORILLA​​​​

MANAGER ‑ ACCOUNTING

REAL FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

+971 4 804 5000

	
 

 <https://chalhoubgroup.com/> 

CHALHOUBGROUP.COM <http://www.chalhoubgroup.com/> 

‑

CAREERS.CHALHOUBGROUP.COM <https://careers.chalhoubgroup.com/> 

 <https://twitter.com/ChalhoubGroup> 

 <https://www.facebook.com/chalhoubgroup/> 

 <https://www.instagram.com/chalhoubgroup> 

 <https://www.linkedin.com/company/chalhoub-group/> 

 <https://www.glassdoor.com/Overview/Working-at-Chalhoub-Group-EI_IE499602.11,25.htm> 



	From: Jerry Lorilla 
	Sent: Friday, 14 March 2025 11:50 AM
	To: James Adams <James.Adams@chalhoub.com <mailto:James.Adams@chalhoub.com> >; Tarek Naoum <Tarek.Naoum@chalhoub.com <mailto:Tarek.Naoum@chalhoub.com> >
	Cc: Georges Jabbour <Georges.Jabbour@chalhoub.com <mailto:Georges.Jabbour@chalhoub.com> >; Bernardita Ramos <Bernardita.Ramos@chalhoub.com <mailto:Bernardita.Ramos@chalhoub.com> >; Waqas Ahmad <Waqas.Ahmad@chalhoub.com <mailto:Waqas.Ahmad@chalhoub.com> >; Vince Mulé <Vincenzo.Mule@chalhoub.com <mailto:Vincenzo.Mule@chalhoub.com> >
	Subject: FW: (URGENT) Request for Credit Note
	Importance: High

	 

	Dear James,

	 

	We need your support on an urgent matter.

	 

	On 14th January 2025,  I received an email supposedly from one of our suppliers,  EIPS (Emirates IP Services ) to update their account number in our system.  With the assumption that it was a valid request, I,  in turn asked  Bernardita, Associate Legal Support, to update the supplier’s bank details which MDM had done accordingly.

chunks.text:
On 14th January 2025,  I received an email supposedly from one of our suppliers,  EIPS (Emirates IP Services ) to update their account number in our system.  With the assumption that it was a valid request, I,  in turn asked  Bernardita, Associate Legal Support, to update the supplier’s bank details which MDM had done accordingly.

	 

	Today, we received an email from our “legitimate”  supplier that their bank account has never been changed.  The scammer is holding an account with ADCB. In this regard, would it be possible to request ADCB to take action against the scammer’s account holder …maybe freeze it and try to recover the amounts that were paid to their account? 

	 

	I have also copied @Tarek Naoum <mailto:Tarek.Naoum@chalhoub.com>  for his opinion in this regard.

	 

	Many thanks.

	 

	Kind regards,

	 

	 

	Jerry

	Sent: Friday, 14 March 2025 10:32 AM
	To: Bernardita Ramos <Bernardita.Ramos@chalhoub.com <mailto:Bernardita.Ramos@chalhoub.com> >

	Subject: RE: (URGENT) Request for Credit Note
